title: Noam Chomsky - 2000-10-30 - on Gender Talk - Interview
description:
Be sure to pick at least 720p for best sound quality.
On October 30, 2000, Noam Chomsky appeared on Gender Talk to discuss his then recent book, _Rogue States_.


I gave it the usual de-noising and EQ, to make it better than the original broadcast.


Tags:


Chomsky, rogue states, peace process, terrorism, Cuba, human rights, Military Industrial Complex, Latin America, Death squads, Seattle demonstrations, World Bank, IMF, International Monetary Fund, World Trade Organizations, WTO, Wage Slavery, Public Relations industry, 2000,
